name: The Wishing Flower
description:
Made for Choko-flan's 2019 Space Bunny jam!

In The Wishing Flower you play as Thomas, a bunny boy who wants to collect moonflowers. Moonflowers are said to call the Star Prince who can grant you anything you desire.

.✫*ﾟ･ﾟ｡.☆.*｡･ﾟ✫*.

I created this game to test my game creation abilities, I decided to go with light platforming and puzzle elements. I hope you like it!

Please note there may be bugs as this was made in only two weeks, I will try to fix them if they're reported.

Credits are available in game but please be sure to check out Monplaisir's music! They created all the music you hear in this game.
